content: {"locationId": "9937", "organizationId": "8027", "name": "Lavalette Food Pantry", "address1": "4623 Route 152", "address2": "", "city": "Lavalette", "state": "WV", "zipCode": "25535", "country": null, "phone": "304-523-5931", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "38.30724", "longitude": "-82.44428", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Wayne WV", "languages": "English", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "Operates out of the Lavalette United Methodist Church.  Large red brick church located on Route 152 just south of the Rt 75 and Rt 152 intersection.", "notes": "We operate as a Drive Through Pantry.  Entry is on the South side of the church.  There is a lower lot behind the church. ", "contactName": "Nancy Webb", "contactPhone": "304-523-5931", "contactEmail": "nlwebbwv@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through", "dietRestrictions": "Dairy Free, Diabetic/Low Sugar, Gluten Free, Nut Free, Other, Vegetarian", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 69, "regionName": "Facing Hunger Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "d6cdcac7-64e3-45cc-9c4f-b501fa20b650.png", "website": "https://facinghunger.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Thursday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Friday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
